Title: 🖼 🇺🇦 💪DTEK invests €140 million in energy storage facilities ...
Description: 🇺🇦 💪DTEK invests €140 million in energy storage facilities to strengthen Ukraine's energy security DTEK will build energy storage facilities in Ukraine with a total capacity of 200 MW to help build a safe and -green- energy system. €140 million will be invested in the project, making the company the largest investor in energy storage facilities in Ukraine. 🔋The batteries will be commissioned no later than September 2025 and will begin providing Ukrenergo auxiliary services. 🔋 We are talking about a number of objects geographically distributed across Ukraine. On August 22, DTEK, together with other energy industry players, won the Ukrenergo auction. This opens up opportunities for the development of the energy storage market and the construction of new balancing capacities. 🔋Energy storage facilities are a strategic direction of DTEK development. - Despite the war and limited access to the foreign capital market, we continue to invest in Ukraine. This is not only the restoration of the destroyed, but also the construction of new facilities within the framework of our long-term development strategy. DTEK was the first in Ukraine to start building energy storage systems in 2021 and actually opened this market in Ukraine. Our priority remains unchanged — it is the development of green energy in Ukraine, the accelerated integration of our energy system into Europe, and the improvement of the energy security of our country, - noted the CEO of DTEK Maksym Timchenko.

Title: 🖼 Oil and gas industry workers are celebrating their professiona...
Description: Today, oil and gas workers celebrate their professional holiday. We thank each of you for the contribution you make every day — at wells, drilling sites, in production and in offices. You ensure the energy security of our country and strengthen its energy independence. Your tirelessness, resilience and professionalism, especially in the conditions of a great war, deserve the highest respect. Congratulations. We wish you new successes and victories!

Title: 🖼 💡Odeszine: DTEK restored electricity for 81,000 families afte...
Description: 💡Odessa: DTEK restored electricity for 81,000 families after the storm From September 4 to 6, a storm raged in the Odesa region, which led to local accidents and power outages. During this period, the energy workers managed to: ✔️ restore 1,743 transformer substations ✔️ repair 91 overhead lines ✔️ restore electricity for 81,000 families in 248 settlements 💡 We continue to work out spot applications Trust the energy workers!

Title: 🖼 💡Odeszine: more than 16,000 families have electricity again a...
Description: 💡Odessa: more than 16,000 families have electricity again after the bad weather Over the past day, DTEK energy workers in the Odesa region managed to: ✔️repair 12 overhead lines✔️recover 268 transformer substations✔️return the light to more than 16,000 families in 44 settlementsEnergy workers continue to do everything possible to restore power as soon as possible to restore the electricity supply in all the houses of Odesa that were affected by the bad weather. The battle for light continues!

Title: 🖼 🕯 Another loss for the Ukrainian family of energy workers: ou...
Description: 🕯Another loss for the Ukrainian family of energy workers: our colleague from Ukrenergo, Viktor Palamarchuk, was killed. On August 26, during a large-scale missile and drone attack by the occupiers, Viktor Palamarchuk came under fire and was seriously injured. All week, doctors fought for the life of the energy worker. Viktor did not live to see his birthday until a few days later. He would have turned 56 on September 7.  Sincere condolences to family, relatives, friends and colleagues from Ukrenergo. We will never forgive!

Title: 🖼 💪 DTEK is the leader of private investments in Ukraine during...
Description: 💪 DTEK is the leader of private investments in Ukraine during the great war. The publication NV published a rating of Ukrainian private companies that continue to invest in the Ukrainian economy during the full-scale invasion of the Russian Federation. The first step in this list is occupied by DTEK. We have already invested 41.2 billion hryvnias since the beginning of the great war. The main part of these funds is directed to the restoration of thermal power plants damaged by the enemy. We also continue to develop -green- energy to make Ukraine's energy system stronger. - Our strategic task is the construction of a new green generation that will increase the stability of the Ukrainian energy system, as well as the development of client services and the introduction of technological solutions to improve the quality of services for our clients, - noted the General Director of DTEK Maksym Timchenko. The battle for light continues. Let's stand and win!

Title: 🖼 Another crime of the Russian occupiers. The enemy attacked Kha...
